QuestData.Title: A Feast of Shadows
QuestData.Description: Many arakkoa died in Veil Akraz. From the outside, all seems still. Empty.$B$BBut in this place between worlds, death never goes unnoticed.$B$BStray life essence seeps through from the other side; a feast for the beings who prowl here.$B$BSlay the shadow creatures here, and gather from their corpses the fine dust they produce. I will need much of it to perform the rites of the Talon King.
QuestData.CompletionText: You know those elixirs you have been so eagerly quaffing?$B$BThey are made of this stuff.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. With this much dust we can delve deep enough to reach the Talon King's refuge.
